name: Dany and Samny
description:
Dany and Samny, and the third wheel: Rookie (SOLD SEPERATELY)

The story of two BOMBASTIC lovers in pursuit of marriage! 

Features!

* Two destructive weapons! Dany's Ruby Glock, and Samny's Cherry Bomb!

* RETRO graphics ~ I know you love them :3

* Chiptune 8-bit retro soundtrack! (If it had music...)

* 32 Levels packed with fun-fun-fun!

*    <------------ Rookie (SOLD SEPERATELY)

* And all other video game features... except the video game...

( For Game Mock-Up Jam)
